attributes.action: make it compulsive that all dogs should be on a lead in the street whatever the breed!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
me and my 3 dogs was attacked in the street by a staffie dog, by defending my dogs i recieved 2 broken bones in my hand and a crushed knuckle, this dog was off the lead and just pounced.
all dogs whatever the breed should be leaded up in public places and if you have a classed dangerous dog than it should be muzzled also!
